I like the layout first of all. It's easy to go back and find what you're looking for. Things move around and get buried in forums and blogs. 
I like that it's clear and easy to fallow, a lot of these zites with zeronet docs are overly complicated. 
I'm just a hobbyist and I tinker with java script a little so coming from CN to here I'm still confused about how to setup a zite from scratch. A live developers chat would be awesome...makes it easier to ask what feels like ridiculous questions.
For example...
https://daniellmesquita.gitbook.io/the-truth-about-zeronet/4.-creating-static-zite#absolute-paths-dont-work
I guess while typing the documentation they skipped over the example explaining how paths actually work.
